griffon.swing

Class AbstractGriffonApplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • griffon.swing.AbstractGriffonApplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GriffonApplication, Observable, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, RootPaneContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingGriffonApplet

    public abstract class AbstractGriffonApplet
extends JApplet
implements GriffonApplication
    Base implementation of GriffonApplication that runs in applet mode.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
